description: Manage Azure Resource Manager template deployment at management group.

commands.name: az deployment mg cancel
commands.summary: Cancel a deployment at management group.
examples: az deployment mg cancel -m testmg -n deployment01

commands.name: az deployment mg create
commands.summary: Start a deployment at management group.
commands.syntax:
az deployment mg create --location
                        --management-group-id
                        [--confirm-with-what-if]
                        [--handle-extended-json-format]
                        [--mode {Complete, Incremental}]
                        [--name]
                        [--no-prompt {false, true}]
                        [--no-wait]
                        [--parameters]
                        [--proceed-if-no-change]
                        [--query-string]
                        [--template-file]
                        [--template-spec]
                        [--template-uri]
                        [--what-if]
                        [--what-if-exclude-change-types {Create, Delete, Deploy, Ignore, Modify, NoChange, Unsupported}]
                        [--what-if-result-format {FullResourcePayloads, ResourceIdOnly}]
examples:
az deployment mg create --management-group-id testrg --name rollout01 --location WestUS \
    --template-uri https://myresource/azuredeploy.json --parameters @myparameters.json

az deployment mg create --management-group-id testmg --name rollout01 --location WestUS \
    --template-file azuredeploy.json \
    --parameters '{ \"policyName\": { \"value\": \"policy2\" } }'

az deployment mg create --management-group-id testmg --name rollout01 --location WestUS \
    --template-file azuredeploy.json --parameters @params.json \
    --parameters https://mysite/params.json --parameters MyValue=This MyArray=@array.json

commands.name: az deployment mg delete
commands.summary: Delete a deployment at management group.
examples: az deployment mg delete -m testmg -n deployment01

commands.name: az deployment mg export
commands.summary: Export the template used for a deployment.
examples: az deployment mg export --management-group-id testmg --name MyDeployment

commands.name: az deployment mg show
commands.summary: Show a deployment at management group.
examples: az deployment mg show -m testmg -n deployment01

commands.name: az deployment mg validate
commands.summary: Validate whether a template is valid at management group.
examples: az deployment mg validate --management-group-id testmg --location WestUS --template-file {template-file}
az deployment mg validate --location WestUS --management-group-id testmg --name mydeployment --parameters @myparameters.json --template-file azuredeploy.json

commands.name: az deployment mg wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a deployment condition is met.

commands.name: az deployment mg what-if
commands.summary: Execute a deployment What-If operation at management group scope.
commands.syntax:
az deployment mg what-if --location
                         --management-group-id
                         [--exclude-change-types {Create, Delete, Deploy, Ignore, Modify, NoChange, Unsupported}]
                         [--name]
                         [--no-pretty-print]
                         [--no-prompt {false, true}]
                         [--parameters]
                         [--query-string]
                         [--result-format {FullResourcePayloads, ResourceIdOnly}]
                         [--template-file]
                         [--template-spec]
                         [--template-uri]
examples: az deployment mg what-if --management-group-id testmg --location westus --name rollout01 --template-uri https://myresource/azuredeploy.json --parameters @myparameters.json

az deployment mg what-if --management-group-id testmg --location westus --name rollout01 --template-uri https://myresource/azuredeploy.json --parameters @myparameters.json --result-format ResourceIdOnly
az deployment mg what-if --management-group-id testmg --location westus --name rollout01 --template-uri https://myresource/azuredeploy.json --parameters @myparameters.json --no-pretty-print
